data.strFullDescription:
[b]Experience the challenge of cooking, but now with only one arm![/b] Grab a friend and you'll have two arms in total.

One-armed cook is a chaotic co-op cooking game for up to 4 people. Work as a team or cook on your own, set your own pace, and don't let the stress of a full restaurant catch up to you. The goofy physics-based aspect of the game gives one-armed cook a new twist.

[h2]Take orders from customers[/h2]
[b]With many different dishes[/b] for the customers to order
you will never run out of something to do.
[img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/1977530/extras/99c199ddf693a8230c47ecb07579a7f7.avif?t=1726551686[/img]

[h2]Prepare and cook your food[/h2]
[b]Simple and intuitive recipes[/b] make the experience much more fluent But should you ever be in doubt, you can always check the recipe book
[img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/1977530/extras/578e64b053687e249d2030610f3a8899.avif?t=1726551686[/img]

[b]Mess around[/b]. have fun with friends and create chaos with the physics
[img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/1977530/extras/8c37e8c87b8f717069883b8fcc8a5192.avif?t=1726551686[/img]
data.strSnippet: One-armed cook is a chaotic co-op cooking game for up to 4 people. Work as a team or cook on your own, set your own pace, and don't let the stress of a full restaurant catch up to you. The goofy physics-based aspect of the game gives this cooking game a new twist.
